attributes.additional_details:
Im very concerned about childrens safety outside wilkinson school walter road bradley bilston.
This morning was the final straw having to step into gardens as cars where mounting the footpath to get past oncoming traffic thats trying to get around ileagally parked cars all trying to get right out side the school . I believe all in the street agreed to to make it 1 way and speed bumps . Whats it going to take ? The death of a child ??
